title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, metallic thread
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pear-shaped linen tassel, braided and knotted. Double loops attached to pear-shaped center unit to which are attached elaborate knottings in shapes of double-headed eagles, floral elements terminating in three dancing figures attached to one another.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen, metallic thread
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-19.
